definitions: the choice, judgment, or control of when something should be done

examples.text: one of the secrets of golf is good timing

shortDefinitions: choice, judgement, or control of when something should be done

definitions: a particular point or period of time when something happens

examples.text: the introduction of new signal timings

shortDefinitions: particular point or period of time when something happens

definitions: (in an internal combustion engine) the times when the valves open and close, and the time of the ignition spark, in relation to the movement of the piston in the cylinder.
shortDefinitions: (in internal combustion engine) times when valves open and close, and time of ignition spark, in relation to movement of piston in cylinder
